evidence.text: Person B: Which parts of me do you find most beautiful? Is there a part of me you would especially like to touch or look at?
Person B: Stop it. I don't find all the parts of you beautiful. There are some parts of you which I like very much.

Person B: My arse; is that what you like? You think it's beautiful?
Person A: Very... It's the space above your brow for me which is the problem-
